question_text:
Question 21
During a particular stage of the growth of a crop, the consumption use of water is 2.8 mm/day. The current 
of water available in the soil is 50% of the maximum depth of available water in the root zone. Consider 
the maximum root zone depth of the crop as 80 mm and the irrigation efficiency as 70%.
The interval between irrigation (in days) will be _______.
